text: Hit sæigð on halgen bocan, þæt æfter gearan ymbryne swa gewurðen scule, þæt eall middeneard mid hæðenra þeode geðrynge by, & mid heordan hæftnysse swa swyðe gedrecced & gedrefod wurðeð, þæt hine uneaðe ænig riht gelefed mann mid þan heofonlicen kinges tacne gebletsigen mote, oððe gesenigen durre.
Þas geswæncennysse we mugen nu mycele mare on us sylfen ongyten, þonne we hit on bocan leornigen.

Þas witen & þas gedrefodnysse þonne gewurðeð, & ateowodnysse þæs awyrgoden Antecristes tocyme, se þe on þysne middeneard toweard is to cumene, þæt is se wiðersace & se deofol þe æt frymðe wið Godes gesceafte gewann, & þurh his oferhyd aðand.
Sæde þæt he mihte rixigen ofer heofones & beon gelic Godes sune.
Þa ne mihten heofones his oferhyd ahebben, ac wearð he mid mihte on helle grundes mid his gemæccen besænct.

Se nu eft on wurlde emne from swyðe facan innoðe onfangen byð, & fram swyðe besmitenan & of unclænan geboren, & mid swyðe manfullen & facnen handen afedod, & he byð on mænnisscre gebyrde, Antichristus genæmnod.

He byð acænnod on þan ungesæligen wongstyde þe Corozaim hatte, & he byð gefedd on Betsaida, & he rixeð on þære byrig þe Capharnaum gecwedon is, & þonne blisseð seo burh Corozaim, for þan þe he on hire byð acænnod, & þonne gefagenað Betsaida, for þan þe he on hire gefedd byð, & þa burhware on Capharnaum mid mycelre oferhyde onhafene byð, & on his rice swyðe gefagenigeð.

For þyssen ungeðwærnyssen, Drihten on his godspelle þa ungesælignyssen cydde mid þan þrym worden, þa þa he swa cwæð, Wa þe Corozaim, & wa þe Betsaida, & wa þe Capharnaum, for þan þe þu talest þæt þu oð heofon ahafen seo, sy þu mid færlicen ryre on helle grundes gereosest.
Mid þan he þonne mænde þæs feondes oferhyde, þe on heom rixigeð, & on eallen middenearde byð swyðe mycele ungeðwærnysse & ðrahlice witen on manna bearnen.
